thread.title: Large Christchurch scrub fire out of control; second fire now burning
thread.title_full: Large Christchurch scrub fire out of control; second fire now burning

title: Large Christchurch scrub fire out of control; second fire now burning
text:
Large Christchurch scrub fire out of control; second fire now burning Last updated 20:45, February 13 2017 1 NEWS 
Several fire engines and helicopters have been dispatched to fight the fire, which is being fanned by brisk winds. 
Two fires are burning on Christchurch's Port Hills. 
A second blaze on the Summit Rd near the Sign of the Kiwi started just after 7pm, stretching fire fighting resources after a huge scrub fire began burning south of the city in the late afternoon. 
Fire engines and helicopters are battling the earlier out-of-control blaze, which has left paddocks blackened. SUPPLIED/RICO MANNALL MARTIN VAN BEYNEN GEORGE HEARD/FAIRFAX NZ SUPPLIED/HELEN STANTON Supplied/Helen Stanton ALDEN WILLIAMS/FAIRFAX NZ George Heard/Fairfax JACK FLETCHER SUPPLIED/STEVEN LINDSAY SUPPLIED JACK FLETCHER SUPPLIED 
A helicopter flies over the Port Hills. 
A fire burning on the Summit Rd, near the Sign of the Kiwi, in Christchurch. 
Out of Control fire in Christchurch on Monday evening. 
Fire rages on the Port Hills in Christchurch. 
Fire engines and helicopters are battling the large out-of-control blaze. 
Members of the public watch the Kennedy's Bush fire rise above the Port Hills on Monday evening. 
Firefighters battling the blaze. 
Fire burning on the Port Hills in southwest Christchurch.

Fire burning on the Port Hills in southwest Christchurch. 
The fire can be seen from central Christchurch. 1 of 12 « Previous « Previous Next » Next » 
A Fire Service spokeswoman said that two helicopters and eight city and rural fire engines have been called in to fight the Early Valley Rd fire.
